values:
Not exactly though, i've taken yesterday and today off simply cuz I had my wisdom teeth out on monday. I'm in a little physical pain, but nothing compared to the phycological pain I had to go through during surgery. I'll explain:

So I call the wisdom teeth people and they explain all these surgery options. One is a local anesthetic, so you're still awake and remember everything. The other is a partial out-ness, where the doc can still communicate during surgery, but you remember nothing after. Lastly is complete out-ness where the doctor can poke you in the eye and it's all good.

I let them know that the mid option sounded good cuz: 1) it was the middle price, 2) i would remember none of the trauma, and 3) I haven't historically responded well to local anesthetics (they dont work well on my and my super-human constitution or something. So I let them know that.

Monday rolls around and I walk into the office, only to be told they hadn't prepped for a partical out-ness and that I could either do it know with a local or re-shedule. I say, "whatever, i'm here, let's get it done."

Well, since I dont respond well to local freezing, the doctor gives me twice as much, but still after waiting for 20 mins he asks, "All nice and frozen?" To which I respond, "Umm...no." He then promptly shoots me up of more novacain and gets started.

The first one is pretty bad, I can hear it being cracked open and gouged. It actually sounded exactly like someone cracking open an oyster. The second one is actually un-noticeable. The third is insanly painful and he goes, "Hmm...should be all frozen, don't worry i'll give you another shot...this time you wont even notice the needle." He's wrong...fantastically wrong. 

I cringe in pain and he makes this inquisitive "Hmm?" sound, as if i'm some sort of anomoly.

He then decides there is little else he can do to ease my pain and begins work on the third tooth. It hurts like hell, and i'm beginning to feel as though I have gained a profound insight into what sort of pain mothers in labour go through.

That one takes forever, and half way he stops and asks "Do you feel pain or pressure?" And i'm thinking, "what the fuck is the difference," but only manage a muffled, "Iono..."

The last tooth is also a bastard, but it finally cooperates. In totally I sustain 1 hour of cracking and squirting and "hmm"-ing from my doctor. Not to mention 12 injections of novacain and some more of anti-swelling medication.

No i'm on Tylenol 3. Lots and lots of Tylenol 3.

I'll be off work one more day, but it'll be business as usual from then till the 10th when my job ends! Yay!

Talk to you all soon!
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/5209.html

So a lot has happened...well not really. I've been insanely busy, working 7 days a week for the past month and a half. I need all the money cuz I'm planning on moving out when I get back from Africa. Speaking of Africa, my malaria medicine gave me some crazy side effects and I had to stop using it and switch  brands. As for my job, it's been great. Stopping industrial espionage and meeting Koreans...really! And I went to the jazz fest for a couple of nights....good fun, good music. I apologize for not making this more entertaining or coherent, but with no day off in more than a month happy Alvin has fled and has been replaced with angry worker Alvin....happy Alvin did manage to resurface on election day though and vote NDP! (Go minority government!) But he's back now....oh, and sorry PEI...looks like you guys are staying red. Tsk Tsk....
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/5094.html

I was all sick this weekend cuz of those damn malaria pills, but that's pver now! It was a small week long test to see if they didn't kill me, and they didn't, so it's good to be used in Mozambique. But they still make me sick! And I mean very sick! But apparently that isn't a good enough reason to declare the drugs incompatible with me...so i'm stuck with them...and the doc said that after a few weeks the side-effects wont be AS bad... I leave you all with a picture:
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/4700.html

"All I remember is sittin' beside you. You said you didn't give a fuck about hockey and I never saw someone say that before. You held my hand and we walked home the long way, you were loosening my grip on Bobby Orr." Well, I have to start taking these malaria tablets to see if this brand is ok, or if I have to switch because of some sorta crazy side effects...one of the main side effects is apparently crazy dreams and nightmares, and that's the mild stuff. It can get as bad as hair loss and suicidal thoughts. So if my posts begin to go south as far as happiness goes, let me know!
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/4542.html

Got my passport today! Feels so cool... Now all I wish is that I was at a Cold War German-Poland checkpoint... Matthau: "He! Kessler! Hergekommen! Es ist ein braunes." Kessler: "Senden Sie ihn weg von diesem Platz" Matthau: "Wartezeit! Er ist ein Kanadier! Betrachten Sie seine Unterlagen" Kessler: "Fluch! Lassen Sie mich das sehen...fluch! Sie haben Recht! Lassen Sie ihn gehen. Hast!" Matthau: "Ja Sir. Sofort!" (Go ahead and Babelfish it! Muhahaha!)
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/4248.html

There is so much more this country could be if we stopped being so damn American and get back to being Canadian, I hear people in good ol' lotus land complaining about 30% brackets and inheritance taxes and yet demanding world class health care. For god sakes people! If you want to have 15% taxes move to Delaware and live a short, unproductive life where your partner becomes obese, your daughter gets pregnant at 13 and drops out of school, your son finds out he's gay and gets beaten up for it, and your next door neighbour pointlessly dies in another illegal and morally unjustifiable invasion. But if you want a life you can stay in Canada, vote for the NDP, accept a 40% progressive taxation scheme where you are not slowly dying of chronic heart disease, your daughter is educated and responsible, your son need not fear discrimination, and you help prevent wars, not start them. Add on top of that: Clean water and air, affordable or free post-secondary, a vibrant green economy, and no working poor and needlessly homeless. Sometimes I think that people over the age of forty should be forbidden from voting...you had your chance, you fucked it up, move over and give us a shot.
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/3987.html

If there is one person you can't stop thinking about, post this same exact sentence in your journal. In other news... I was just at the bank getting a money order for my Canada World Youth fee and this woman says to me from behind, "Where are you going?" I thought she was talking to someone else, so I dont say anything. Then she taps me on the side and asks again. It turns out she did the program when she was 18 and went to India and Vancouver, she was from Montreal at the time, and now lives here. It was so weird, but awesome at the same time. We talked about her experience and stuff and it was good. So now i'm more stoked than ever to get on with it all! Now I have to eat pudding...
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/3701.html

First of all, you'll have to excuse me if I cant sustain the current level of entertainment for all my posts. My life is not usually extravagantly humorous, and now is no exception... Since I work at a government agency, they have all these french materials so people can learn. I was gonna join their classes, but they are still on numbers and simple adjectives (like jolie) after 18 months! So the teacher (yep they have a teacher for the office) said that it would be much too slow for me, so she gave me a bunch of tapes and CDs...it's good. I've always wanted to be able to speak french conversationally...but I hate classroom style french instruction with a vengeance! So my goal is to learn it myself...I figure with 4 solid months of learning I can at least get partially there. And I don't get my day off tomorrow 'cause the damn president of the corporation is coming here for her yearly visit and speech...so I HAVE to go to work...no photography day after all. Oh, and Robyn...please refrain from the urge you no doubt have to post a reply in french.
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/3441.html

So I am this big NDP supporter, I don't think that's a huge secret or anything, anyways...the NDP candidate in our riding is Libby Davies, she's won twice before and she rocks. So they call me up and ask if I want a sign, and I go, "Of course, the biggest one you have!" and they're all like, "Wicked! It's yours." So the sign goes up a couple of days later and it looks great and i'm smiling 'cause you can see it 4 blocks away in either direction. Now I get home today and notice something sticking out of my mail slot, so I go downstairs and grab it. Lo and behold it's a campaign flyer from Shirley Chan, the Liberal candidate running against Libby. This wouldn't have been that big a deal, even though there's a big Libby/NDP sign out front that you cant miss and it makes no sense to waste a flyer on a house that's basically screaming "We're voting for Libby, eat it!". What made it a big deal was that the person who dropped it off wrote at the top of it, "We think she's a better candidate, here's why." and then all her campaign stuff below on the flyer. That pissed me off. I dont know why, but it did. So here we have some dipshit who's walking down the street peppering homes with Shirley Chan flyers and they come to a house with a gigantic NDP sign (a sign so large infact that it needs to be held up by 2x4's hammered into the ground, you know that kind) and they think..."hmm...while it appears obvious this person is never in hell going to vote Liberal, i'll drop off a sign nonetheless, and while i'm at it i'll write a small message designed to sway the vote of the reader even though it's so painfully obvious I dont stand a chance in actually having the message work." Anyways...So i'm reading this...half mad...half laughing at the utter idiocy of this flyer-hander-outer and I get an idea. I take out my sharpie and write below their writing (that says, "We think she's a better candidate here's why,") "I DONT...HERE'S WHY." I wrote 10 points, every one of them true, and with the little space I have on the back I write that there is not a chance i'll vote for a Martin Liberal and that it was a waste of time to flyer a house with a friggin' huge Libby poster. Since this post is excessively long, I wont bother you with the details of what I wrote here, but if you are curious at my 10 reasons (because they are serious and they are all true) post a reply and i'll post what I wrote. *exhale* There you have it...Kiri, you're not the only one. (Oh, and Robyn...maybe you could use the info since you're doing that mock election thingy...let me know) BTW: Here is a pic of the front and back of the flyer after I was done with it...
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/3319.html

The following is a message from the United States Government:

The individual you know as Alvin (aka: AlbinoPigeon) was taken into custody at 8:43am PST by the CIA. Due to a random internet surveillance exercise his picture was flagged and upon closer inspection tagged as a possible Iraqi agitator. CIA central command was notified at 8:12am PST and our agents moved in to apprehend the suspect. The individual was found at 8:42am PST eating a shredded wheat cereal product submerged in milk. He put up no struggle but was reportedly muttering obscenities under his breath, most of which directed to an individual he referred to as "That damn PEI girl and her damn livejournal."

The Government of the United States and the CIA would like to express our gratitude to a one "Robyn" (aka: Faithfuldonut) without whom this potentially dangerous aggressor would have never been detained and subsequently held in a small steel framed box covered in chicken wire. We would also like to commend the actions of Agent Clive, keep up the good work Agent.

-End Communication-
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/2964.html

(Yep, yet another song that needs downloading! - Fitting as the Libs just called an election...download it and let it be your election campaign theme song!)

Have you ever been talking to someone that you don't really know, but kinda do...so you talk about the weather and your plans for the evening and stuff like that...and the person starts to walk and you think they need to get going so you say, "Alright, see you later!"...but they weren't really walking away, they were just walking...like pacing...and now they think you want to get rid of them and they have this weird look on their face like, "umm...ok" and they begin to walk away, but keep looking at you over their shoulder with that same, "umm...ok" look. And you're left there in the middle of the sidewalk holding a plastic bag with this stupid feeling that you kinda just pissed of some nice person who was having a nice time talking to you but now thinks you hate them....and other people around you are now pissed at you too 'cause you're blocking the way to the nice apples...and she was kinda cute too....
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/2441.html

Ahhhhhhh....(that was me exhaling comfortably)

(BTW: I dont know if anyone pays attention the song part of the entry, but this is totally a song that needs to be downloaded!)

I had 2 nice back to back days of rest.....very good after these crazy 9 hour work days...and this long weekend plus my day off next week will be awesome! It's summertime so that means BBQ and beaches and okanagan springs (esp their new White Grape Cider...so good!)

I'm finally getting some work to do so that means less falling asleep at my desk and no more livejournal (BAD! BAD! BAD!)

Oh and speaking about livejournal at work guess what?! In my last entry, I thought I randomly made up the names "Jack" and "Don" but I totally forgot that Don is the name of my manager! If he reads it i'm sooooo fucked! THANKS A LOT ROBYN!!! j/j
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/2569.html

So we have this pretty liberal internet policy at work...basically you can casually use the net for your own thing, as long as it is only once in a while (ie: 10 mins a day during break). They actually log everywhere you go and how long you use the net for, just so they can catch you if you are searching for swedish something or others... So I decide, "hmm...maybe i'll check my livejournal, and see what others have posted." Up pops Robyn's journal and lo! What do I see but..."aww yeah. sexsexsexsexsex." I quickly shut down the window, but i know that it's already been logged. So if by chance the IT guys are looking through my log and decide to check up on what i've been doing they'll come across a little something called "livejournal.com"....and maybe, just maybe, one of them will be like, "hmmm Jack...sounds like some sorta porno journal site...better check it out." And the other guy, who we now know is named Jack will go, "hmmm...I think your right Don...those crazy brown guys and their porno journals...we can't have any of that." So Don and Jack open up the site and WHAM! they see, "aww yeah. sexsexsexsexsex." And Jack goes..."good call Don, it WAS a porno journal." And Don will reply, "Yep! Sure was...I have a sense about these things ya know..." Minutes later my boss will show up at my cubicle with a print out of the page that says, "aww yeah. sexsexsexsexsex." And he'll say to me..."Alvin what the hell are you doing?! Visiting your PORNO JOURNAL on company time?! Clear out your desk...you're fired!" And i'll look at my chair and go..."Damn...it was a comfy chair...and I had it just the way I wanted it...damn..." I mean, really Robyn....*sigh*
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/2279.html

I've known for a week now that tomorrow is my first day of my new job, but I guess it didn't sink in until minutes ago in the shower. Now I can't sleep...so I dance! (And my shirt makes me look hot...just like Kiri!)
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/1984.html

arrrr....it's 1:00am here...not good. Tomorrow i'm working all day...starting at 7:00am, which means I have to get up at 6:00am, which means less than 5 hours of sleep. And the there's a party at a "friends" place. It's the girl I told you guys about...the head in lap one...the one you were making fun of me about! (Stop laughing! I know you're laughing right now!) I don't think i'm gonna go, I really don't want to deal with her right now...
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/1769.html

There's still a little bit of your taste in my mouth...
There's still a little bit of your face I haven't kissed...

Stones taught me to fly
Love taught me to lie
Life taught me to die
So it's not hard to fall when you float like a cannonball...

(wow, what a great song. It's been in my head all day long, that's gotta mean something...)
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/1519.html

It's over! It's all done! Thanks to Dave and his awesome reference I landed the CMHC job and I start next monday! Next up, the purchasing of some shirts and ties! Yea! So excited! My first job is to organize an incoming delegation from Thailand!!! So it's co-op until Sept 5th and then CWY on Sept 7th....get back in March and then a small rest until Ottawa '05 and an insane drunk-fest at Robyn's!!! Life is good! BTW: Here's another Ottawa pic, Boris downing a 2-6 of Absolut....those crazy Russians...
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/1039.html

It's back to Africa! Class! CWY called and told me that they could give me the Mozambique/Okanagan placement, so I'm off to the Okanagan on Sept 7th and then Mozambique sometime in mid-December. It's gonna be a very hot 7 months!

In other news, I had my job interview this morning, I had gum in my mouth and didn't remember to spit it out as I came into the room, according to the UBC co-op people gum chewing in an interview is bad manners. So I opted to swallow it instead...seemed the better of two options. The interview went well, but now I feel sick, damn Dentyne.

I might just do the Boris thing, it'd be fun. Send me that list of songs, i've been trying to download any songs that you post on your journal, but my Acquisition isn't working well.

Hopefully you wont be the only one reading this journal and posting pity comments! I'm trying to get all my old high school friends to do it, it gets handy when you're all spread out.
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/999.html

mmmm...nice sleep. Although, as I woke up and looked around, I realized that waking up the previous day in Kiri's bed was much nicer. So, kinda dissapointed and a bit sad. Anyways, time to share some pictures. Too bad the only person i'll be sharing this with is Robyn since I haven't gotten anyone else to do this journal thing. So here is Robyn in what looks like a make out session with Jerad. And it turns out that iTunes has a new playlist publishing feature thing, so you can publish the Drunkathon list and i'll publish mine. (Sorry, that Permadrunk Plastered PT Party didn't happen). Oh, and let me know how to get you the other picture, the potato sandwich one.....
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/549.html

home now from another crazy week in Ottawa. Everyone, it was so nice seeing all of you! (esp. Dave, Heather, Jamie, Robyn, Kiri, Elodie, Jiv...) These benders are gonna kill me though! Smart Barbara was on my flight back (haha! take that Jiv!). Now as Kiri put it, "back to our respective realities." Or how Robyn put it, "Grrrrr...hehehehehehe...(head in pillow)"

So it looks like the Ukraine instead of Africa for me (damn CWY) but it should be fun anyways. I'll be working in community centres and with schools and stuff, so I think it'll be great (only much colder and with vodka...mmmmm vodka). My departure date is August 23, 2004 and the program finishes February 26, 2005 (just in time for another drunken stupor of a weekend, whoohoo!

Now I must turn in and allow my body to cleanse itself of all that vodka and bad tequilla...
http://albinopigeon.livejournal.com/390.html
